**Welcome to the Options Campus** <:emoji_4:1138407149148569630> 

The following channels will teach you the basics of options trading and how to options trade by yourself. <:stonks_up:1130228305187053568> 

Although we teach you how to trade by yourself 

We still have a daily options livestream 👥 

Where you can follow our calls

The daily live streams can be found here 👉🏽 <#1088215147643936929> 

The link is posted every day at 9:30 am 🕘 

Note - We recommend you complete the lessons before you join our livestream.

Once you become an advanced trader you can safely make **$300 - $1,000** a **day** with weekends **off.**

Let's get to work. 

Start the **basics** here 👉🏽 <#1088208750726361118> 

Start learning to **trade** here 👉🏽 <#1131773042834542672> 

<@&1137731154447958086>
